name: HTTP Cat
description: A playful API providing images of cats representing HTTP status codes

about.overview: HTTP Cat API provides images of cats that correspond to HTTP status codes, making error handling more delightful.
useCases: Educational tool for HTTP status codes

endpoints.description: Retrieve a cat image for a specific HTTP status code

quickStart: Visit https://http.cat/{status_code} with any valid HTTP status code
Use the image URL directly in your application

authentication.description: No authentication required; simply access the image URLs.
